Master Medea: According to my investigations, this Resonance Amulet can be repaired with the Divine Stone of Wisdom possessed by both Ketra Orcs and the Varka Silenos. But I cannot leave here. I know you are on a quest to find the Tablets, so this is a task well suited for you. Both the Ketra Orcs and the Varka Silenos have a Divine Stone of Wisdom. You must earn one tribe's trust obtain their Stone. Which tribe will you choose?
